subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: England, Spain and the Netherlands maintained perfect starts in World Cup qualifying to open big leads for spots in the 2010 tournament in South Africa. Italy and Germany were also winners Wednesday, heading into a six-month break.
snippet: England, Spain and the Netherlands maintained perfect starts in World Cup qualifying to open big leads for spots in the 2010 tournament in South Africa. Italy and Germany were also winners Wednesday, heading into a six-month break.
